title: THOUGHT / ART COP
description: Conceptualization is really interested in your Art Cop ideas

dialogueTree.title: Conceptualization: "Why does art inspire you so much?"
dialogueTree.text: Why does art inspire you so much?

links.title: You: "It does, yes -- but what *is* art?"
links.text: It does, yes -- but what *is* art?

links.title: Conceptualization: "Excellent question. Art is a divers..."
links.text: Excellent question. Art is a diverse range of visual, literary, auditory, and performative creativity! It's an expression of imagination and technical skill. Additionally, it's history, criticism and pure enjoyment...

links.title: Conceptualization: "In short, art is the highest form o..."
links.text: In short, art is the highest form of human communication -- representation, narrative, emotion and agency intertwined.

links.title: You: "Would I fit into the art world? I m..."
links.text: Would I fit into the art world? I mean...

links.title: Conceptualization: "Have you looked in the mirror latel..."
links.text: Have you looked in the mirror lately? You have the exact features of a savage art critic, with that beard and those clothes! Dishevelled and *prophetic*. Perhaps you should try to critique architecture too!

links.title: You: "Hold on, is architecture also art?"
links.text: Hold on, is architecture also art?

links.title: Conceptualization: "Of course not, it's autism. Box-dra..."
links.text: Of course not, it's autism. Box-drawing. Masturbation with a ruler and a sextant or whatever they use. You should demean and criticize the genteel institution of architecture. While extolling the virtues of the *pure* arts.

links.title: You: "Wait, what about music? Is it art?"
links.text: Wait, what about music? Is it art?

links.title: Conceptualization: "Only the most experimental kind."
links.text: Only the most experimental kind.

links.title: You: "That's stupid. Architecture is stup..."
links.text: That's stupid. Architecture is stupid. Music is stupid.

links.title: You: "I guess I *have* been feeling criti..."
links.text: I guess I *have* been feeling critical lately.

links.title: Conceptualization: "Yes! You seek substance. No vapid r..."
links.text: Yes! You seek substance. No vapid representations and reproductions of social mores, as made manifest in stuffy biennials, we're talking real *living art* here. Become the Art Cop. Half art critic -- half cop.

links.title: You: "Wait, but don't I have to be 100% c..."
links.text: Wait, but don't I have to be 100% cop -- to get the case finished and all that?

links.title: Conceptualization: "Quit being so indecisive. What are..."
links.text: Quit being so indecisive. What are you going for here? Some kind of indecisive and *camp* aesthetic now? Strike a bold shape here. Go art or go home.

links.title: You: "Okay. If 50% art critic is what's n..."
links.text: Okay. If 50% art critic is what's needed to free me from rote repetition, so be it. (Opt in.)

links.title: Conceptualization: "Exactly. It's not *only* your duty..."
links.text: Exactly. It's not *only* your duty to only catch the criminals of the street, you must also apprehend criminals of the printing press and the gallery -- the trite and derivative artists and writers of the world!

links.title: Conceptualization: "Go ahead and provide savage critici..."
links.text: Go ahead and provide savage criticisms, Art Cop. The world is yours to rip to pieces and reassemble!

links.title: You: "No. I cannot risk another copo-dive..."
links.text: No. I cannot risk another copo-diversion at this point. Go away! (Opt out.)

links.title: Conceptualization: "Bravo! Continue, then, in the medio..."
links.text: Bravo! Continue, then, in the mediocre and vulgar epigones of the world. So what if everything is incomprehensibly shit and you can see it. Take no responsibility.

links.title: Visual Calculus: "This was a good call. That guy prob..."
links.text: This was a good call. That guy probably thinks forensics is autism too.

links.title: You: "That's stupid. Architecture is stup..."
links.text: That's stupid. Architecture is stupid.

links.title: Conceptualization: "Such vigour! Already you express a..."
links.text: Such vigour! Already you express a sharp descriptive mind, ready to slice through the empty and superficial in favour of the *sublime* and the *beautiful*... Do it. Become the Art Cop. Half art critic -- half cop.

links.title: You: "No, art is for arrogant blowhards...."
links.text: No, art is for arrogant blowhards. Why am I getting this?

links.title: Conceptualization: "Is it? Yet your eye constantly seek..."
links.text: Is it? Yet your eye constantly seeks out the most critical side of any aesthetic confrontation. You follow the expressions of imagination and technical skill with curiosity...

links.title: You: "[Discard thought.]"
links.text: [Discard thought.]
